name: Blood(loss) is lethal
description:
Controls

After a long sleep, Dracula has awakened and needs blood to strengthen himself.

Use A and D to move left and right.

Use W to jump and S to slide under obstacles.

Collect the blood drops to survive! Full bar will bring you in a rage mode where you can destroy obstacles with the spacebar. Empty bar will cause you to dry out and die. Be careful the black blood drops will dry you out.

Your score will be calculated by the time you survived, blood drop count, destroyed objects in rage mode and close dodge bonus as well each one will be multiplied by 10 points.

How long can you survive?  Can you beat the highscore?
